title: Begin Again (Taylor's Version)
description:
Taylor Swift wanted to bookend this album with a hopeful song... It's the moment that you are ready to risk everything for another chance at love. What was the inspiration behind this song? We break it down, and read some fan mail from some lovely listeners!
What did we miss? What would you like to hear from us? There are lots of ways to reach us!

CONTACT THE PODCAST!
Email – the13podcast@gmail.com
IG: https://www.instagram.com/the13podcast

CHECK OUT OUR OTHER PODCASTS!

This podcast is in no way related to or endorsed by Taylor Swift, her companies, or record labels. All opinions are our own.
